FuncDef: The display recording-scheme command displays the configuration information about a recording scheme.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
It is a case-insensitive string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Using this command displays the following configurations:
Name of the recording schemeTemplate used in recording
The recording scheme name is optional in the AAA view. If no recording scheme is specified, you can view the configurations of all recording policies.
